name: Dungeons and Doors (surmime, FColor04)
description:
A first person dungeon crawling prototype game.
Swing swing swing your sword and get to that glowing portal in time.

External assets (credits)
Lovely hand painted dungeon by L2S ARTS.
Burly hands with attack animations by AstroDev; Fernando Ferreira.
Weapon and door SFX from kenney.nl
